results.abstract: Nupi Keithel, or Women’s Market, a 16th-century bazaar in which all of the vendors are women, is a fountainhead of social and political activism in the Indian state of Manipur.

results.title: Covid-19 Upends South Korea’s Thanksgiving, and Its Rituals
